column5: The Pool was really slow today..  That might even be an understatement.  Dunno if the rain lastnight turned the fish off, but sheesh we worked really hard for a couple of small dinks..  I got home around noon, had a nap, ate some dinner and decided to hit a local trout stream.  Water was gin clear..  Lure of the day was a BlueFox #0 silver spinner.  Picked up about 10 or so small bows, biggest about 10inches.  Had a pic all setup for the biggest fish, but she flopped loose and back in the drink she went, lol..  I did get a pic of this little beauty though.    Hopefully you guys had better luck today then me!
we also found the fishing slow today, nice colours on that fish.
Beautiful fish bill! Hmmm  trout stream around Barrie you say...
Love the colors on that fish.... Great job BillM  Thanks for sharing Leechman
They are in my opinion the winner of the fish beauty contest
